Uses of Class
org.jgrapes.portal.events.RenderPortlet

  • Packages that use RenderPortlet 
    Package Description
    org.jgrapes.portal
    Provides the components for building a portal based on the core, io and http packages.
    org.jgrapes.portal.events
    The events used by the portal related components.
    org.jgrapes.portal.freemarker
    Classes for implementing a freemarker based portlet.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractPortlet.RenderPortletFromReader
      Send to the portal page for adding or updating a complete portlet representation.

    • Uses of RenderPortlet in org.jgrapes.portal.events

      Methods in org.jgrapes.portal.events that return RenderPortlet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RenderPortlet RenderPortlet.addSupportedMode(Portlet.RenderMode supportedMode)
      Add the given render mode to the supported render modes.
      RenderPortlet RenderPortlet.setForeground(boolean foreground)
      Id set, the tab with the portlet is put in the foreground when the portlet is rendered.
      RenderPortlet RenderPortlet.setRenderMode(Portlet.RenderMode renderMode)
      Set the render mode.
      RenderPortlet RenderPortlet.setSupportedModes(Set<Portlet.RenderMode> supportedModes)
      Set the supported render modes.
